title: I'm Not So Tough
lyrics:
Verse 1:
I'm not so tough
I just act that way
To keep my heart from breaking
Every single day

Chorus:
But when you look at me
With those eyes so blue
I'm not so tough
When it comes to you

Verse 2:
I built these walls so high
To keep the pain away
But love keeps finding ways
To sneak in anyway

(Repeat Chorus)

Bridge:
All my defenses fall
When you call my name
I'm not so tough at all
Love is a dangerous game

title: World of Hurt
lyrics:
Verse 1:
Living in a world of hurt
Where love comes last
Holding onto broken dreams
From a distant past

Chorus:
In this world of hurt
I'm searching for the light
In this world of hurt
Trying to make it right

Verse 2:
Every scar tells a story
Of the pain I've known
But I keep on believing
I won't walk alone

(Repeat Chorus)

Bridge:
Somewhere beyond the darkness
There's a brighter day
I'll find my way out of here
I'll find another way

title: Dear John
lyrics:
Dear John,
I'm writing this letter
To tell you goodbye
I thought you should know
The reason why

Chorus:
Dear John,
I can't stay
Dear John,
I'm walking away
You broke my heart too many times
Dear John, this is goodbye

Verse 2:
I gave you my everything
But it wasn't enough
Now I'm taking back my life
I'm calling your bluff

(Repeat Chorus)

Bridge:
Don't come looking for me
I won't be there
I'm done with the lies
I'm done with your tears
